formulas.title: Formula (extracted text)
formulas.raw: Azimuth to Bearing: Bearing = (Azimuth + 180) % 360 Bearing to Azimuth: Azimuth = (Bearing - 180) % 360

formulas.title: Formula (extracted text)
formulas.raw: The Formula Explained The conversion between azimuth and bearing involves specific trigonometric calculations: Azimuth to Bearing: Bearing = (Azimuth + 180) % 360 Bearing to Azimuth: Azimuth = (Bearing - 180) % 360
